content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DOSE
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --DOSE
      operator: greater_than_or_equal_to
      value: 0
Core:
  Id: FDA.VALIDATOR.SD0014
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --DOSE is a negative value
Outcome:
  Message: Negative value for --DOSE
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: FDA
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: FDA Validator Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: SD0014, Publisher ID FDAB040
              Version: '1'
            Version: '1.5'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Non-missing Dose (--DOSE) value must be greater than
                  or equal to 0.
                Document: FDA Validator Rules v1.5
                Section: N/A
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --DOSE is a negative value

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Non-missing Dose (--DOSE) value must be greater than or equal to 0.
